title: katana
description: A katana is a Japanese sword characterized by a curved, single-edged blade with a circular or squared guard and long grip to accommodate two hands.

title: wakizashi
description: A wakizashi is a traditional Japanese sword with a shorter blade than a katana, typically used as a backup weapon or for close-quarters combat.

title: tanto
description: A tanto is a Japanese dagger with a short blade and a single or double edge, typically used for stabbing or slashing in close combat.

title: naginata
description: A naginata is a traditional Japanese pole weapon with a curved, single-edged blade mounted on a long shaft, typically used by samurai warriors.

title: yari
description: A yari is a traditional Japanese spear with a straight, double-edged blade mounted on a long shaft, typically used by samurai warriors for thrusting and slashing.

title: ninja-to
description: A ninja to is a traditional Japanese sword with a straight, single-edged blade and a square guard, typically used by ninjas for stealthy assassinations.
